member.name: PRJ_NOTIFICATION_PARAMETERS.PostCreate.NotificationMask
member.summary: Upon return from the PRJ_NOTIFICATION_CB callback, the provider may specify a new set of notifications that it wishes to receive for the file here. If the provider sets this value to 0, it is equivalent to specifying PRJ_NOTIFICATION_USE_EXISTING_MASK.

member.name: PRJ_NOTIFICATION_PARAMETERS.FileRenamed.NotificationMask
member.summary: Upon return from the PRJ_NOTIFICATION_CB callback, the provider may specify a new set of notifications that it wishes to receive for the file here. If the provider sets this value to 0, it is equivalent to specifying PRJ_NOTIFICATION_USE_EXISTING_MASK.

member.name: PRJ_NOTIFICATION_PARAMETERS.FileDeletedOnHandleClose.IsFileModified
member.summary: If the provider registered for PRJ_NOTIFICATION_FILE_HANDLE_CLOSED_FILE_MODIFIED as well as PRJ_NOTIFICATION_FILE_HANDLE_CLOSED_FILE_DELETED, this field is set to TRUE if the file was modified before it was deleted.
